com.blq.networksdk

类 CryptLib

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.blq.networksdk.CryptLib

  • public class CryptLib
extends java.lang.Object
    CrossPlatform CryptLib

    This cross platform CryptLib uses AES 256 for encryption. This library can be used for encryptoion and de-cryption of string on iOS, Android and Windows platform. Features: 1. 256 bit AES encryption 2. Random IV generation. 3. Provision for SHA256 hashing of key.

    从以下版本开始:
    1.0
    作者:
    navneet

        public static final java.lang.String md5(java.lang.String inputString)

        inputString -
        返回:
        md5 hash of the input string

      • SHA256

        public static java.lang.String SHA256(java.lang.String text,
                                      int length)
                               throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                      java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        This function computes the SHA256 hash of input string
        参数:
        text - input text whose SHA256 hash has to be computed
        length - length of the text to be returned
        返回:
        returns SHA256 hash of input text
        抛出:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

      • encrypt

        public java.lang.String encrypt(java.lang.String _plainText,
                                java.lang.String _key,
                                java.lang.String _iv)
                         throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException,
                                javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
        This function encrypts the plain text to cipher text using the key provided. You'll have to use the same key for decryption
        参数:
        _plainText - Plain text to be encrypted
        _key - Encryption Key. You'll have to use the same key for decryption
        _iv - initialization Vector
        返回:
        returns encrypted (cipher) text
        抛出:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException

      • decrypt

        public java.lang.String decrypt(java.lang.String _encryptedText,
                                java.lang.String _key,
                                java.lang.String _iv)
                         throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException,
                                javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
        This funtion decrypts the encrypted text to plain text using the key provided. You'll have to use the same key which you used during encryprtion
        参数:
        _encryptedText - Encrypted/Cipher text to be decrypted
        _key - Encryption key which you used during encryption
        _iv - initialization Vector
        返回:
        encrypted value
        抛出:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
